relation: There is a mall with an AMC movie theater nearby, many restaurants, and a bowling alley. Horseneck Beach is also relatively close by.
Have an open mind, try new things, and focus on your studies, but don't hesitate to have a good time.

This school is a decent state school that takes academics pretty seriously. There are many ways to get involved around campus, including Division III sports, club sports, concerts, and other various on-campus activities. The scenery is gorgeous, but the buildings are gray and very drab.
pageTitle: University of Massachusetts-Dartmouth (UMass Dartmouth) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot I know that I set out to learn from some of the top professors in the New England area, however who would have thought that these Masters and PhD holders would be so cool. They have bright and creative ways to help their students learn and because of the smaller classes it makes it easier to focus. Login to rate or flag the reviews Amanda from Swansea, MA 10/26/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 8 out of 8 people found this review useful. 2 of 54 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Students that live near by who cannot afford a more expensive college. Tips for prospective students If you can, live there! Commuting wastes a lot of gas, especially if you want to do things there on the weekends. During the winter, it is so much safer than driving in the snow. Lastly, look at their scholarship page on the University website while you apply. There
